invite_founders_hint: Founders will be able to edit the microsite and change all microsite settings.
invite_moderators_hint: Moderators cannot edit the microsite settings but will have additional privileges such as posting content in bulk and featuring objects.

name_hint: Kindly provide the name of your microsite. Keep the name concise, as longer names may not be properly formatted in all locations, and the microsite URL will be generated based on this.
